1.title: Humble Beginnings
1.plot: Andy, Brad and Ed set off to turn their meager investment, and started one of the most interesting microbreweries to compete in the California craft beer scene. With little hope, less money and a ton of inspiration, they did just that.

2.title: Everything Breaks
2.plot: Building and running a small business is a challenge and will break all of your equipment like the plumbing, hoses, electrical cords, bottles tanks and on. Real bad day, your heart. In this lesson, watch the boys overcome the daily hazards associated with being a small, underfunded and resilient craft microbrewery, and how they survive to fight another day.

3.title: The Ghost Pepper Challenge
3.plot: If you brew beer and your day starts with you putting on a face mask, goggles and protective clothing topped off with industrial grade hand gloves, you probably should have stayed in bed. Lastly, if given the opportunity to eat the world's hottest known pepper raw, the words "here, hold my beer" are usually said prior to destroying your taste buds.

4.title: 99 Bottles of Beer
4.plot: If necessity is the mother of invention, you still need vision, money and the proper equipment to succeed. In the absence of all that, do it the caveman, Brew Rebellion style.

5.title: Rebel's Last Adventure
5.plot: COMING SOON S1: E5, Rebel's Last Adventure ByadminPublished on January 4, 2017 SHARE TWEET COMMENT The circle of life is full of a lot of meaningful thoughts, ideas and actions. In this case they all revolve around bacon.

6.title: Bark and Brew
6.plot: Dogs don't drink beer but the people they own certainly do. Chocolate pumpkin pie stout may cause humans to dress their pups up in funny costumes, you have been warned.

7.title: This Is the End
7.plot: Import an Italian rock band to do a concert at our little brewery and the end result will be great new friendships, beer and awesome music. In addition to that, the city will send you a letter telling you to knock that sh.. off.

imdb.plot outline: Barely Beer Barons shows how three friends found their path to brewery ownership and the promise of fresh craft beer for their San Bernardino, California-based brewery. The show chronicles Brew Rebellion's dream of brewing up a business, approaching the operation in their brand of unconventional, unfettered acumen. By their own accounts, "It's ugly, but it's all theirs."
imdb.title: Barely Beer Barons
plot: _Barely Beer Barons_ (qv) shows how three friends found their path to brewery ownership and the promise of fresh craft beer for their San Bernardino, California-based brewery. The show chronicles Brew Rebellion's dream of brewing up a business, approaching the operation in their brand of unconventional, unfettered acumen. By their own accounts, "It's ugly, but it's all theirs."::Andy Sparhawk
